content: When I passed by the Academia's botanical garden as a child, I accidentally damaged some of their special plants too...
info: NPC事件模板15-赠送种子-1005幻雪_15-赠送种子

content: You want me to plant some more so you can trample them?
info: NPC事件模板15-赠送种子-1005幻雪_15-赠送种子

content: {A叹气}Me? I'm apologizing to the crops. I accidentally stepped on them while observing the stars. I hope it won't affect their growth...

content: {A点头}Don't worry, I promise I won't... won't step on them again...

content: S-Sorry, I stepped on them, yeep... Here are <style=Highlight>{数量}</style> packets of <style=Highlight>{种子包}</style> as compensation, yeep...

content: {A笑眯眯}Thank you, now I feel much more at ease. I look forward to the day when they can be harvested.
